title: Ham, Potato, and Cabbage Stew
ingredients: ½ teaspoon ground black pepper, or to taste
method: Step 1: Melt butter in a Dutch oven over medium heat. Add onion and cook until it begins to turn clear, 2 to 5 minutes. Stir in carrots and garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.

Step 2: Stir in cabbage, ham, and potatoes, then add stock, pepper, mustard, and salt. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and cook, stirring occasionally, until cabbage is tender and potatoes are cooked, about 20 minutes.
Step 3: You can use ham stock instead of chicken stock.
